headline: Overnight Chia Oats
description: Overnight chia oats are a delicious breakfast that can help jumpstart your day. Make several jars at a time for a few days of grab-and-go breakfasts.
name: Overnight Chia Oats

recipeInstructions.text: Combine almond milk, oats, mashed banana, and chia seeds in a 1-pint jar. Seal with a lid and shake until well combined. Refrigerate until chia seeds have swelled and mixture is thick and gel-like, 8 hours to overnight.

review.reviewBody: Delicious treat I added a few drops of vanilla extract an a pinch of salt to take it up a knotch....yummy!

This Overnight Breakfast Idea that make for a Bright Start to the Day is wonderful, healthy, tasty easy, and can be modified. I have made a similar recipe many times and like other reviews I prepared several at a time and kept them in the refrigerator for a quick and satisfying breakfast. Also, for a change have switched the fruit or added either nuts or coconut instead of chia seeds, used regular milk instead of almond milk and garnished with toasted slivered almond or whatever I had on hand and always turned out just as good. This recipe is very forgiving and fabulous!
Yummy! I added more bananas. Will try with coconut mil in future and use nuts too.
I found the quantity of milk was a little less than needed. Still stays chewy. Overall I liked the recipe but was a bit disappointed with the texture. It was a little better with a little more milk.
I added strawberries and blueberries as well
Was so easy and quick next day
I make with any fruit I have on hand. We like to heat the mixture from the jar to a bowl in the microwave for breakfast. It is very nourishing and good.

This is a great weekday breakfast. I make several at a time and keep them in the refrigerator for a quick and satisfying breakfast. I followed the recipe exactly, and they turned out great. The only modification was that I added 1/4 cup of raisins to each jar. This is a game changer. The raisins rehydrate and become plump and juicy, with a nice crispness to them, like when you bite into a fresh grape. Definitely one of my favorite new items to make.
Nice taste but I like my oatmeal hot
It tasted just fine but the texture of the Chia seeds are different.
I LOVE this recipe. Ever since I found it on the internet I make it every night so I can have it ready for breakfast. Thank you
I'm eating while reviewing it. It is wonderful, my husband loves it too. It's easy to make, great tasting, and healthy.
Easy and delicious! I make this at least 3 times a week, just switch the fruit or I add either nuts or coconut. Love it
Super Easy and SUPER GOOD TOO! 5 stars!
